glossentry.glossdef: A termbase (TB), also known as terminology database, is a glossary of industry-specific and company-specific terms, which you can manage outside your translation memories. It is a glossary of terms in a CAT tool that you can create to be able to search for individual words and display them among translation results. It is useful if there are multiple translators working on the same project and itâ€™s important to keep accuracy and consistency regarding the main terms. It can be single-language or multilingual. A term base shows the translators which terms are new, approved, forbidden, or preferred together with their additional description, definition or picture.
